title: OER Science Textbook Development and Project Learning Based on Open Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science fundamentals and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative project implementation using OER materials in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze OER materials to select and reorganize content suitable for science project topics.
Learners can collaborate with peers and teachers to produce digital textbooks following open pedagogy principles.
Learners can collect and analyze science experiment data using smartphone-based tools and share them in OER format.

resources: Smartphone-compatible collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs mobile version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
